verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Moab, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because he burned the bones of the king of Edom into lime:
verses.verse_html: 1Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Moab, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because he burned the bones of the king of Edom into lime:

verses.text_plain: But I will send a fire upon Moab, and it shall devour the palaces of Kerioth: and Moab shall die with tumult, with shouting, and with the sound of the trumpet:
verses.verse_html: 2But I will send a fire upon Moab, and it shall devour the palaces of Kerioth: and Moab shall die with tumult, with shouting, and with the sound of the trumpet:

verses.text_plain: And I will cut off the judge from the midst thereof, and will slay all the princes thereof with him, saith the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 3And I will cut off the judge from the midst thereof, and will slay all the princes thereof with him, saith the Lord.

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Judah, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they have despised the law of the Lord, and have not kept his commandments, and their lies caused them to err, after the which their fathers have walked:
verses.verse_html: 4Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Judah, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they have despised the law of the Lord, and have not kept his commandments, and their lies caused them to err, after the which their fathers have walked:

verses.text_plain: But I will send a fire upon Judah, and it shall devour the palaces of Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 5But I will send a fire upon Judah, and it shall devour the palaces of Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Israel, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they sold the righteous for silver, and the poor for a pair of shoes;
verses.verse_html: 6Thus saith the Lord; For three transgressions of Israel, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they sold the righteous for silver, and the poor for a pair of shoes;

verses.text_plain: That pant after the dust of the earth on the head of the poor, and turn aside the way of the meek: and a man and his father will go in unto the same maid, to profane my holy name:
verses.verse_html:
7That pant after the dust of the earth on the head of the poor, and turn aside the way of the meek: and a man and his father will go in unto the same maid, to profane my holy name:
 maid: or, young woman

footnotes.body_html: maid: or, young woman

verses.text_plain: And they lay themselves down upon clothes laid to pledge by every altar, and they drink the wine of the condemned in the house of their god.
verses.verse_html:
8And they lay themselves down upon clothes laid to pledge by every altar, and they drink the wine of the condemned in the house of their god.
 the condemned: or, such as have fined, or, mulcted

footnotes.body_text: the condemned: or, such as have fined, or, mulcted
footnotes.body_html: the condemned: or, such as have fined, or, mulcted

verses.text_plain: Yet destroyed I the Amorite before them, whose height was like the height of the cedars, and he was strong as the oaks; yet I destroyed his fruit from above, and his roots from beneath.
verses.verse_html: 9Yet destroyed I the Amorite before them, whose height was like the height of the cedars, and he was strong as the oaks; yet I destroyed his fruit from above, and his roots from beneath.

verses.text_plain: Also I brought you up from the land of Egypt, and led you forty years through the wilderness, to possess the land of the Amorite.
verses.verse_html: 10Also I brought you up from the land of Egypt, and led you forty years through the wilderness, to possess the land of the Amorite.

verses.text_plain: And I raised up of your sons for prophets, and of your young men for Nazarites. Is it not even thus, O ye children of Israel? saith the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 11And I raised up of your sons for prophets, and of your young men for Nazarites. Is it not even thus, O ye children of Israel? saith the Lord.

tokens.text: not even thus, O ye children

verses.text_plain: But ye gave the Nazarites wine to drink; and commanded the prophets, saying, Prophesy not.
verses.verse_html: 12But ye gave the Nazarites wine to drink; and commanded the prophets, saying, Prophesy not.

verses.text_plain: Behold, I am pressed under you, as a cart is pressed that is full of sheaves.
verses.verse_html:
13Behold, I am pressed under you, as a cart is pressed that is full of sheaves.
 I am: or, I will press your place, as a cart full of sheaves presseth

footnotes.body_text: I am: or, I will press your place, as a cart full of sheaves presseth
footnotes.body_html: I am: or, I will press your place, as a cart full of sheaves presseth

verses.text_plain: Therefore the flight shall perish from the swift, and the strong shall not strengthen his force, neither shall the mighty deliver himself:
verses.verse_html:
14Therefore the flight shall perish from the swift, and the strong shall not strengthen his force, neither shall the mighty deliver himself:
 himself: Heb. his soul, or, life

footnotes.body_text: himself: Heb. his soul, or, life
footnotes.body_html: himself: Heb. his soul, or, life

verses.text_plain: Neither shall he stand that handleth the bow; and he that is swift of foot shall not deliver himself: neither shall he that rideth the horse deliver himself.
verses.verse_html: 15Neither shall he stand that handleth the bow; and he that is swift of foot shall not deliver himself: neither shall he that rideth the horse deliver himself.

verses.text_plain: And he that is courageous among the mighty shall flee away naked in that day, saith the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
16And he that is courageous among the mighty shall flee away naked in that day, saith the Lord.
 courageous: Heb. strong of his heart

footnotes.body_text: courageous: Heb. strong of his heart
footnotes.body_html: courageous: Heb. strong of his heart
